scenario_text.value: What’s up, Minoru? Find anything?
Nope, not at all...
I figured we’d have better luck here...

(I’m glad Minoru’s focused, but he might be
overdoing it a little...)

(I want to let him rest, but we’re on the
clock to find that shrine...)
(What should I say to him?)
Let him rest.
Have him keep looking.
Let him rest.

Let’s take a little break. Pushing any more
will just wear us out.

Are you sure? We don’t have much time, and if
we don’t hurry...

What’s the point in finding the Holy
Beasts if we’re exhausted?
Plus, one way or another...

We were able to find them before. That’s why
we’ll definitely do it again.
...Yeah, okay. Let’s take a little rest.

I agree to this course of action. A rest is
sure to makes certain things more apparent.
Thanks, Takuma.
Have him keep looking.

Let’s look a bit longer. We should be able to
find them if we stick it out.

Yeah, you’re right. C’mon, Falcomon, let’s
put our elbows into it!
Indeed. Let’s continue our search.
Later. Yell if you find anything!
Yeah, you’ve got this!

(Minoru’s all over this. Should I go check
a different spot?)

Should be around here... I’ll look around
this area a little longer!

Ho, the lad’s resolve is unerring. Fear not,
for I am with him.
